# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Creates a motion effect from data in an unarchiver.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init?(coder: NSCoder)
```

## Initializing a motion effect

- **init(keyPath:type:)**: Initializes and returns an interpolating motion effect object configured for the specific tilt direction.

items.description: Initializes and returns an interpolating motion effect object configured for the specific tilt direction.
